item.description:
Explore Boston's legendary waterfront on your MP3 player. This hour-long audio tour will guide you along the downtown Harborwalk to places you never knew existed.

This FREE walking tour is set to an original soundtrack of aquatic beats and rhythms.
* Meet the seals at the New England Aquarium
* Step up to Eddie Hook?s office at Hook Lobster
* Hear the tragedy of New England?s Titanic

Download the audio tour: The Boston Harborwalk MP3/IPOD Tour

If you would like to carpooling please indicate it in your RSVP so, you can make arrangements with other interested members. Below are the Park & Ride locations and Public Transportation websites.

Car Pool:
NH - Park & Ride Lots
MA - Park & Ride Lots
ME - Park & Ride Lots

Public Transportation:
"Nashua - Boston Express"
"Mass Bay Transportation Authority"

Things to bring: Camera, IPOD/(MP3 Player (recorded CD)), Ear phones,Water, Snack, Suntan Lotion.

After the walk we will find a local restaurant to eat at.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me at 12:30 at the Nashua's Welcome Center (Exit 6 off of Rte 3)
item.name: The Boston Harborwalk MP3/IPOD Tour
